title: PBE Error 500 Message
body: I was recently accepted into the PBE. And when I came home to try and set up my account, I kept getting the Error 500 message. And I know I'm not the only one because a friend of mine was also accepted and had the same issue. Help please?

replies.body:
One way I found to get past the error is I get sent to the page "https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe"

However, if I change the adress to "https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup" It works just fine
The 500 error at the PBE site is a known issue that's currently being investigated.  Some players were able to resolve this through using a VPN, though it's no guarantee.  Hang on until then!

Yeah I have that too. It's either that or I get redirected to the "Apply to be a Tester" page. The support just told me to clear my cache or use a VPN. Both options aren't working, but I think they don't care enough to do something about it.
